channel.title: King can be executed early if Possessor jumps in him
channel.description:
#### What happened? Possessor jumped in King N1. After that we accused and executed King D2.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? King can't be executed before D4.
#### Steps to reproduce: Read above.
#### Comments:

item.title: King can be executed early if Possessor jumps in him
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
That did indeed happened before, moral of the story: Don’t possess king body early game.

Read full topic
item.source: King can be executed early if Possessor jumps in him

item.title: King can be executed early if Possessor jumps in him
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Possessor isn’t king if it jumps, it just looks like them. OK not sure if this is a bug, but it is usually a bad decision for a possessor to jump into the king as it is too easily discovered anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: King can be executed early if Possessor jumps in him
